questions: what are the degrees offered in your college?
degrees offered in Thuto Ke Lesedi University
can you tell me the degrees available in UNI?
can you tell me the branches available in UNI?
answers:
Thuto Ke Lesedi offers degrees across multiple level of study. We have Undergraduate and Postgraduate degrees. 
 The Faculties available are Engineering & IT, Humanities, Health Sciences and, Economics & Management Sciences(EMS). 
 Would you like to know more about a specific faculty or level of study?

questions: How long does it take to complete a degree
How many years do we study?
answers:
All our Undergraduate degrees except Health Sciences take a period of 3 years
 Health Sciences degrees take a period of 4 years to complete
 Our Postgraduate degrees take a period of 2 years Part-time for Masters and a period of 1 year for Hons

Undergraduate degrees are 3 year degrees, Health Sciences degrees are 4 year degrees 
 For Postgraduate degrees they are 1 year degrees for Hons and 2 years for Masters Part-time

questions: Which degrees do you have in the Faculty of Economics & Management Sciences
What degrees are available in the Faculty of EMS
answers:
For Undergraduate study level, We have Bachelor of Commerce Accounting sciences, Bachelor of Commerce Entrepreneurship & Business Management, Bachelor of Commerce Economics, Bachelor of Commerce Marketing 
 For Postgraduate study level, We have Bachelor of Commerce(Hons) Accounting Sciences, Bachelor of Commerce(Hons) Marketing, Masters of Commerce Accounting Sciences, Masters of Commerce Marketing

questions: Which degrees do you have in the Faculty of Engineering & IT
Degrees in the Engineering & IT faculty
What degrees are available in the Faculty of Engineering & IT
answers:
For Undergraduate study level, We have Bachelor of IT Human Computer Interaction, Bachelor of IT Information Technology, Bachelor of IT Information Systems, Bachelor of Engineering Civil Engineering, Bachelor of Engineering Mechanical Engineering & Electronics 
 For Postgraduate study level, We have Bachelor of IT (Hons) Information Systems, Bachelor of IT (Hons) Computer Science, Masters of IT Information Systems, Masters of Engineering Electronics & Computing

questions: Which degrees do you have in the Faculty of Humanities
What degrees are available in the Faculty of Humanities
answers:
For Undergraduate study level, We have Bachelor of Arts Law, Bachelor of Arts Psychology & Sociology, Bachelor of Arts Audiology, Bachelor of Political Sciences, Bachelor of Information Design 
 For Postgraduate study level, We have Bachelor of Arts (Hons) Law, Bachelor of Arts (Hons) Audiology, Masters of Arts Community & Development Studies, Masters of Arts Policy

questions: Which degrees do you have in the Faculty of Health Sciences
Degrees in the Health Sciences faculty
What degrees are available in the Faculty of Health Sciences
answers:
For Undergraduate study level, We have Bachelor of Science Nursing, Bachelor of Science Occupational Therapy, Bachelor of Science Medicine, Bachelor of Science Pharmacy, Bachelor of Science Physiotherapy 
 For Postgraduate study level, We have Bachelor of Science (Hons) Dietetics, Bachelor of Science (Hons) Human Physiology & Occupational Hygiene, Masters of Medical Pharmacology, Masters of Occupational Therapy
